EmailTemplate.subject: Volunteer next weekend and get a FREE ticket to our #NCSActionDay party!

Hey {!Contact.FirstName},
NCS ACTION DAY IS JUST ONE WEEK AWAY!
Nationwide day of volunteering plus a HUGE NCS party - are you in?
By volunteering you'll win a FREE ticket to our NCS Action Day celebration with performances from MC Infecta , Joshua Kyeot and Represent FMs House DJ Lorrelle Lambert!
Click here to sign up now, or scroll down for more information...

Volunteering on NCS Action Day guarantees you a FREE ticket to our massive NCS Action Day party, but if you don't have time to volunteer you can pay for a ticket by clicking here.
Like us on Facebook and follow us on Twitter to be kept up to date with the latest information!
If you have any questions, head to our brilliant new website or send Megan and Sam an email at tcs.northlondon@the-challenge.org.
